channel.title: Software on FACER2VM
channel.description: Recent content in Software on FACER2VM

item.title: The Surrey Face Model
item.description: This page is concerned with the availability and downloading of the 3D morphable face models created at the Centre of Vision, Speech and Signal Processing at the University of Surrey. The models are available in these resolutions: 29587, 16759, 3448 and 1724 vertices.
